rows.label: qst720303_msg0001
rows.name:
A fire-breathing monster...
good thing Wadatsumi was with us.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0002
rows.name:
Something like that
is no trouble at all.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0003
rows.name:
Looks like this thing was
the source of the scorch marks.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0004
rows.name:
That's right... to think
such a dangerous monster was
this close to Torigo Village.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0005
rows.name:
It might have been driven out
of its home in a turf war, too.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0006
rows.name: Or maybe humans stole its home.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0007
rows.name:
To them,
we're probably the real monsters.

rows.label: qst720303_msg0009
rows.name:
The day will come when humans have
to fight each other over the limited
resource that is the Divine Beasts.
